title: Dose response - describe relationship of variables

content.description:
Directions: Each of the questions or incomplete statements below is followed by five suggested answers or completions. Select the one that is best in each case.

The following questions refer to the graph below showing the relationship between the induction of cancer in breast cells and the concentration of anastrozole.
content.question: Based upon the data, what is the best description of this relationship?

choices.label: As the concentration of anastrozole increases, the percent induction of breast cancer also increases.
As the concentration of anastrozole increases, the percent induction of breast cancer decreases.
There is a direct relationship between the concentration of anastrozole and induction of breast cancer.
It is more advantageous to be exposed to low amounts of anastrozole.
Anastrozole has no effect on breast cancer induction.

content.answer: As the concentration of anastrozole increases, the percent induction of breast cancer decreases.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
